Uses of Class
com.flamingOctoIronman.framework.manager.Manager

  • Packages that use Manager 
    Package Description
    com.flamingOctoIronman.core.manager
    Provides com.flamingOctoIronman.core.manager.CoreManger classes for the subsystem level, and a CoreManagerManager to handle them.
    com.flamingOctoIronman.framework.manager
    This class houses the framework for making Managers and controlling them via ManagerMangers.
    com.flamingOctoIronman.subsystem.debugging
    The purpose of this package is to provide a system for debugging.
    com.flamingOctoIronman.subsystem.HID
    This package allows for the connection to human interface devices.
    com.flamingOctoIronman.subsystem.render  
    com.flamingOctoIronman.subsystem.resource
    This is a package for the resource subsystem.
